Texts.Chs: 这个设备上面似乎悬浮着某种有趣的科技。我建议你立即展开调查。
Texts.Eng: There appears to be some sort of interesting technology suspended above that device. I recommend immediate investigation.

Texts.Chs: 我不确定传送门把我们送到哪儿来了，然而，我在前方某处探测到了未知的信号。你应该调查一下，并且想办法离开这里。
Texts.Eng: I'm not sure where this teleporter has dropped us off. I am, however, detecting unknown signals up ahead somewhere. You should investigate, and find a way out.

Texts.Chs: 这种设计真的相当古老。这扇门看起来是密封的，但是足够的爆发力或许可以强行炸开它。
Texts.Eng: This is of truly ancient design. The door appears sealed, but might open to sufficient explosive force.

Texts.Chs: 这些遗迹很有可能几千年来都没有被造访过。我想知道前方到底有怎样的秘密在等着我呢？
Texts.Eng: It is highly likely that these ruins have not been accessed in thousands of years. I wonder what mysteries await?

Texts.Chs: 我检测到前方有几米被削弱过的材料。你可以试着深入挖掘，看看会发生什么。
Texts.Eng: Ahead I detect several meters of weakened material. You could try digging through and see how that goes.

Texts.Chs: 另一个红色的门。粉碎它！
Texts.Eng: Another red door. Smash it!

Texts.Chs: 这里的门似乎受到某种东西的远程触发。我只能隐约地读取到某种传感器的连接。
Texts.Eng: The door here appears to be triggered remotely by something. I can only faintly read connections to some sort of sensor.

Texts.Chs: 一定有什么东西可以触发这扇小门。我们或许该去其他地方找一找，看看能发现什么。
Texts.Eng: Something must trigger this small door. We should probably hunt around elsewhere and see what we can find.

Texts.Chs: 这个房间被煞费苦心地藏了起来，不让其他人发现。这里面肯定有一些值得调查的东西。
Texts.Eng: This room was painstakingly hidden from casual view. There must be something above worth investigating.

Texts.Chs: 看来我们还需继续探索！我在你目前的位置下面检测到众多敌对的IFF读数，请务必做好防范措施。
Texts.Eng: It seems we have more to explore! I am detecting numerous hostile IFF readings below your position, so do take precautions.

Texts.Chs: 不敢相信！这艘飞船仍在运转，尽管它的性能已经被大幅降低了。它不太可能继续用于旅行，但我们肯定能从它的系统中学习到一些东西!
Texts.Eng: Impossible. This ship is still functioning, albeit at vastly reduced capacity. It is unlikely that it could travel, but we could certainly learn something from its systems!

Texts.Chs: 我相信这个开关连接到了其他地方的系统。我们应该往回走，看看在激活控制台后有什么被打开了。
Texts.Eng: I believe this switch is linked to systems elsewhere in the facility. We should backtrack and see what has opened up once we've activated the console.
Readings are scattered here. These machines are likely interfering with the signal. I cannot detect lifesigns or robotic signatures accurately. Extreme caution is advised.

While its actual function is somewhat of a mystery, this unusual device appears capable of infusing weapons, armor and other gear with cosmic energies. I imagine with it, one could vastly improve gear quality.
We appear to be well and truly trapped. The way back has been blocked. I am also detecting an extremely powerful machine nearby, and it appears to be targetting your specific DNA.
To get through here, you're going to need a Distortion Sphere II or Armor Sphere. Otherwise, you'll have a tough time...
Press down to drop a bomb and blow this tile up!
Now you'll need some fancy timing. Use bombs to launch yourself upwards. Then do it again, and you're through.
Excellent. You have activated the Master Manipulator using this Crucible as a power source! Now you can really obliterate matter like a champ! Go!
Welcome to this testing facility. Please do note that in order to participate in the activities therein, you will need to possess a ranged weapon.
Please keep your limbs and personal effects on the platform at all times. The facility is not responsible for any death or loss resulting from your stupidity.
It is imperative to note that due to the nature of the tests in this facility, you may very well end up stuck through very much fault of your own.
If this happens, please feel free to assume a fetal position, weep at your lack of forethought, and beam out of the facility.
Contained within the chest ahead is a Personal Spatial Transference Module, or in layman's terms, a Translocator. Please retrieve it. It will be required for testing.
Please note that from this point onwards, your performance will be evaluated. Use your translocator to navigate the tests in an expedient manner.
You will be graded on factors such as time, adroit use of the translocator, attitude, non-vapourisation, and other common test parameters.
Some like it hot.
Unlike other spatial transference devices, the relocator is pellet-based. Please make use of this advanced physics-compliant property to bounce away from this puzzle.
Being spatially relocated can be disorienting, but I have full faith you will overcome this obstacle. That, or be vapourised.
Thank you for participating in this small test! On behalf of all members of the facility, allow me to congratulate you on a job well done!
You may be pleased to know that you are in the upper quartile who managed to complete this section of the facility without partial or complete vapourisation.
Please depart via the radar in a calm and orderly fashion. Do remember to take your belongings with you.
'A test of the mind for the faithful. If the wrong levers are thrown when the console is activated, you will surely be destroyed.'
'Even more interesting is that despite being only one sample, it appears to code for several different creatures...we'll need to look into this. It's a bit worrying.'
'Hey, Backy - have you seen my cat? I know she likes to wander around, but I haven't seen her for a couple days now. Starting to get worried.'
'In some ways, they're like advanced hive insects, a single advanced superorganism. There seems to be something giving them purpose, but I can't determine what. Containment is vital.'
'In the next room, throw down two.'
'In this room, throw down four without four to make twelve.'
'In this room, throw down three without three to make eight.'
'Pete, the fish are looking pretty sickly. I think there's something in the water - filters probably got clogged again. I'll be down the maintenance hatch all day Tuesday, just FYI.'
'The organic samples arrived today from Anomalous Materials. We're very excited to work with them; the administrator has moved up the testing schedule.'
'These are nothing like we've ever seen before. Almost...no. If we succeed here, we're all getting promotions. This could be the discovery of the millennium.'
'To make things worse, things are getting out of hand; it's spreading. How the hell did they get to the aquarium? And what's going on in the dorms?'

'Vaughn, are you out of your mind? You talked to Alisa about your findings?! I told you clearly, no one outside Letheia is allowed to know what you're doing down there! You know what a gossip she is!'

'We've cleared all nonessential vats for the project. Doubling times are far lower than expected; the biomass reproduces at an astounding rate. We need to find a way to effectively control this thing.'
'We've run the numbers; there's no doubt about it. All models for growth, lifespan and metabolism only work when applied across the entire population, rather than to individuals.'
...Do you even know what that sstuff doess to your inssidess, Fisshface?
...Kluex above. A complete slaughter.
...Silence them all.
...This sounds exactly like the kind of inane 'experiment' the Miniknog would devise for their own amusement.
...We mustn't give up hope.
A dead end? This isn't right...
A frog village. How quaint. The locals don't look friendly.
According to the data, the chamber you are in appears to be an experimental setup dedicated to determining whether critters can indeed feel pain.
After 6,703 runs, the results are stated as 'Inconclusive. More funding required. Please petition for research grants next sol cycle.'
After all this work...I think there's some kind of final puzzle here. Have you discovered any clues while here, dear?
After all, does the pot not reflect upon the potter's intentions and spirit?
Alas, this is the end of a beautiful friendship. Incinerate your Companion Punchy to continue. Only one of you may leave the facility alive.
Allow me to expresss my infinite gratitude that it iss you and not me who iss down there.
Amused. Don't judge, lad. Some people take great joy in turning a trip to the washroom into a matter of life and death!
And I think you sshould pussh the button! Then hunt the horrible monsster which appearss!
And so your pilgrimage ends. Here, in the heavens, one is the closest to Kluex as one can be.
Appalled. This warlord has been holding such lovely damsels hostage! If only I were younger, I would be down there with you!
Before you do anything else, though, check in with the forward team leader and get further details of the task at hand.
Behind you! Run!
Blessed with powers from Kluex himself, Avos' greatest warriors are sent to the grand temples as guardians! I'm sure you'll find them strong and friendly!
Brr, it's cold! I hope you wrapped up well!
But what's really exciting is that you're likely to meet not just one, but multiple stargazers! Oh, if only I could meet such important personages!
Commissar Vonel is a high-value target; his mountain facility and dacha are bound to be well-guarded. Eliminating him will deal a serious blow to the Miniknog's logistics operations.
Commissar Vonel's officers are dangerous foes, as you've probably experienced by now. Be careful.
Concerned. Are you all right, Lady Bright? You appear to be shaking quite intensely.
Confident. I scaled statues like this all the time in my youth. Surely you can do so as well!
Contact with the Steele Tech(TM) energy lances will invariably result in vaporisation.
Contained within this chest is a Tool For Spatial Transference Of Living Matter, or in layman's terms, a Relocator. Please retrieve it. It will be required for testing.
Cultists! Just what are they doing here?
Did the cultists set this trap?
Did you say something, Madame Bright?
Do note that gravity anomaly fields are in effect on board this facility; while you will still fall, it will not hurt you.
Do you remember the Ixodoom we fought? It may even have come from here!
Do you see that crystal battery over there? My hunch is that it powers the trap. Please smash it and see what happens.
Do you smell an ambush? Because all that darkness sure does.
Entertain me.
Esther Bright
Even enemies may have something to teach us, dear.
Excellent work, dear! I think the lack of shielding was creating that irregularity. I'm sure there're more to be found - keep an eye out for odd changes in the walls!
Extracting data from server...reading...
For villains and thugs, these people are certainly well-read.
Friendship with Companion Punchy established and online. Friendship levels detected at 13.3 percent.
From here, one may view the aether, from here, one may view boundless eternity and realise one's smallness in Kluex's vast glory.
Going up the hill was hard enough...now we have to go DOWN? Give me a break!
Great job getting in! Now the hard part begins. While you were out, Three-Eyes here started working his magic - how're you doing with those access codes?
Great job! Let's move on - the Commissar's home is bound to be crawling with guards.
Hank's men have dug into the hill with fortifications and traps. Hope you're confident enough in your combat abilities to bust their barricade!
Happily, Companion Punchys are made of sugar, spice, everything nice, and chemical X, rendering them impervious to vaporisation.
Have a very safe and educational day.
He also hopes you have as much fun playing Extra Dungeons as he did in making all these missions for you to enjoy! Please, stay awhile and rest before moving along!
Head down and rendezvous with Tavish DeGroot; he should be somewhere nearby.
Here, suspended with the power of avolite crystals, we can be the closest to the aether - and Kluex himself! Gosh, isn't he mighty?
Hey, it's Letheia Cola! Anyone have any pixels?
Hmm. Do you see that door to your left, dear? There's no handle, but I think an explosion could blast it apart. Missiles are traditional, but any explosive should do.
Hmph. Burning the planet? I say we should nuke it from orbit. That's the only way to be sure.
However, it is stationary, and requires a recharge of about five seconds before it can be activated again. The blue ready light atop the chassis indicates charge status.
I can't remotely assume direct control of the facility's security systems, but I can give you permissions to operate them. Hope that helps.
I don't know how much more of this I can take. If I were still Grand Protector...if we could make Lethia pay for this somehow...
I estimate it will take about 90 seconds for adequate power to be restored to the door. Additionally, I detect an immense number of lifesigns converging upon your position.
I fail to see the humour in your words.
I have a bad feeling about this...
I might go and have a look myself once it's safe to do so.
I must beg your attention. I have located the coolant system for this facility's fusion reactor nearby to the west. There is a manual override to shut down the coolant pumps.
I once ssaw a holo-movie; it had an alien that could go anywhere it wanted via crawling through ventss. It also sstabbed thingss with itss tail.
I simply do not understand such architecture. Who would build deadly traps in their home? What sort of twisted mind would live in such a place?
I suppose you could take this path if you wanted to avoid detection... although the old security systems are likely to have gone haywire.
I think I'll come along as well, and I'm not taking no for an answer.
I'll admit I was skeptical when every password was an anagram of 'banana', but they seem to have worked. Their firewall is pretty tough, though.
I'm really sorry about the AI. The programming team was having a rather...unique day when they were coding the humour module.
I...I don't believe this. There shouldn't be any forces holding you up. And yet...
I...remember reading about this. Before Earth's demise, a Protectorate division was dispatched here to investigate a distress signal. None of them returned.
If you allow the reactor to overheat, there is a 100% chance it will explode, burning this moon and all Ruin biomass.
In order to enter the vent, you will need to use your sonic sphere tech. My calculations suggest the middle of the hazard fence should do it.
It is dark. You are likely to be eaten by a grue.
It is likely that you will require the spike sphere or some variant thereof to navigate this complex. I suggest equipping such at the available console.
It is the force of faith itself! Kluex empowers the unshakeable!
It knows what you intend, dear, and will do everything in its power to stop you.
It looks like the temple ends here, yet this doesn't feel right...
It looks much cruder than the other ones we've seen so far. And much larger, too.
It takes two to tango.
It would appear that the protectors tried to make a stand here. The door to the coolant systems is lacking power, but it can be restored through the console ahead.
Ixodoom husbandry iss a revered sskill amongsst the floran. Ixolingss raissed in thesse cavernss are brought to other planetss to grow.
Keep on your toes. I'm detecting a massive energy signature ahead.
Keep up!
Keeping peace in the galaxy is what the Protectorate is about, dear. Apprehending this criminal would certainly show we're up and about, if nothing else.
Kluex protect this soul in the aether beyond. Starvation is a slow and terrible way to die.
Koichi
Lana Blake
Let's see how well you do under pressure.
Look, Fisshface! It's your home!
Looks like you'll need someone helpful to hold down this button for you while you enter through the door.
Might I take this moment to introduce everyone to the concept of cosmic karma?
My database indicates this temple is suspended over a gas giant. Falling will result in your death. The triple jump, while not essential, will be exceedingly useful.
My name is Generic Omnipresent Voice, or GOV for short. While you are in the facility, I will be your guiding authority.
My scans of the ruins suggest that you'll need the double jump or some iteration thereof to successfully traverse the ruins. Remember to have such equipped.
My scans suggest a 76% chance of this switch being important. You should disable it.
No, no...I'm...I'm fine. I've come to terms with it. There are no survivors. And I had dared to hope.
Noble. Ascend the tower, O protector, and cast the vicious warlord from its top!
Nostalgic. This tower blights the land, a bastion of villainy where cruel warlords hoard stolen wealth and train their armies. I encountered many in my youth.
Now this looks ominous. It's as if the altar was set up to receive the sacrifice of some small, helpless critter...
Now what is this we have here? Keep an eye out for secrets such as these.
Now, I'm not usually one to judge, but...
Nuru
Of course not! This is the test of faith: step out into the aether, friend, and Kluex himself will bear you across the sky!
Oh look, it's this again. To get at all those sweet, sweet pixels you'll need to consign this cat to a slow, painful, needless death.
Oh look. More fire. Of course it hass to be fire! Why am I not ssurprissed?
Oh my. Look at that trap ahead, dear. It seems particularly deadly.
Oh! This is a kinetic orb cannon! They're great artifacts left to us by Kluex himself!
Oh! This is the grand observatory! From here, the Stargazers peer into the heavens and study the aether with great diligence!
Oh, I just figured out what else the cat console was linked to - the door you just came through. Good thing you weren't greedy and avoided being bitten in the ass by karma, eh?
Oh? You have been given permission to tour the Sky Boulevard? I'm impressed! It's one of the most sacred sites off Avos!
Old habits die hard, don't they? He still thinks you're a tourist...
Partners often switch sides in a dance.
Please prepare yourself before you activate the console. Judicious and effective use of the Steele Tech Plasma Gatlings will be essential to your survival.
Please proceed into the room ahead; I will instruct you further there.
Please proceed to the button to meet a very special friend.
Please stop and listen! The inscriptions ahead are important! Let me translate:
Please utilise this weapon judiciously, as I suspect you will need it soon. Several lifesigns are converging on your location.
Please, let's take a moment to meditate on what you went through to get here, and what you have learned.
Preliminary scans suggest that the sonic sphere will be essential here. If you have not already done so, please equip it at the nearby console.
Readings indicate your peril level is 5 morts. You are in less peril than would immediately appear. Please check the room thoroughly.
Rebel intelligence indicates that you'll need the spike sphere to effect entry into the facility in question. We've provided a console for you to swap it in, if you forgot.
Reflective. I don't know about that, but it certainly makes for good exploring!
Relax a while in our fully-equipped pleasure chamber.
Remember that this facility has no checkpoint; if your position is overrun, you will likely perish. I commend your bravery. Good luck.
Remember what the hunter said - if you die, you'll have to start all over again! Give the florans 15 minutes or so to reset the arena, and then you can make another attempt.
Remember, avoid the goons in black with visors. You won't be able to hurt them, and their bullets will rip right through your armour. Anyone else is fair game, though.
Remember, you can't fight the goons in black directly. You'll have to find alternative ways to dispose of them - be creative.
Restoring corrupted data...reading...
Sarcastic. Well, isn't this a lovely sight.
Ssayss the guy who drinkss Lethia Cola.
Stand on the platform and make a small leap. A SMALL leap. It's like flying!
Stars above...how? Did they not realise what they were toying with here? This changes a lot.
Stop right there, criminal scum! Nobody breaks the law on my watch!
Success! Teamwork levels are now non-negligible. Please enjoy a moment in the Comfort Chamber with your Companion Punchy before proceeding.
Such a beautiful place, flourishing under the desert! Ah...it makes me tear up. If I had actual eyes, that is.
Teamwork is mandatory in the testing facility. Non-compliance will not be tolerated and you will be penalised for failure to display a sufficient teamwork exponent.
That appears to be our best chance, dear. Since there're no survivors, this place MUST be destroyed.
That's different!

Texts.Chs: 男爵
Texts.Eng: The Baron

Texts.Chs: 前方的人造物似乎已连接到主配电网络，但没有明显的激活方法。请试验一下看看。
Texts.Eng: The artifact ahead appears to be connected to the main power distribution network, but there is no readily evident means of activating it. Please experiment.

Texts.Chs: average sawblade的主要猎物是立方形的身上有肉的家伙，但对你来说同样致命。
Texts.Eng: The average sawblade's primary prey is cube-shaped boys of meat, but it is equally deadly to you.

Texts.Chs: 门被锁上了，而开关在钟楼里。有没有办法触发或让它失效，或者摧毁它？
Texts.Eng: The door's locked, and the switch is on the inside of the bell tower. Is there a way to trigger, or failing that, destroy it?

Texts.Chs: 门被锁了，但我看到一扇敞开的窗户，你可以从那进去。
Texts.Eng: The door's locked, but I see an open window you could get in by.

Texts.Chs: 该设施似乎处于封锁状态。如果我们能找到幸存者，无论希望多么渺茫，也将是一个巨大的慰藉。
Texts.Eng: The facility appears to under lockdown. If we can find survivors, however unlikely, that would be a great relief.

Texts.Chs: 森林正派出自己的监护人来对抗邪教徒。不过，我不认为他们会意识到到你正试着帮助他们。
Texts.Eng: The forest is sending forth its own guardians to fight the cultists. I don't think they recognise that you're trying to help them, though.

Texts.Chs: 寺庙的正面看起来被严密保护着。还有另外的方式进入吗？
Texts.Eng: The front of the temple looks to be heavily guarded. Is there another way in?

Texts.Chs: 门的开关在远处的守卫塔里 - 看，你甚至可以透过窗户看到它。但窗户太小无法爬进去...
Texts.Eng: The gate switch's in the far guard tower - look, you can see it through the window. It's too small to climb in through, though...

Texts.Chs: MOD制作者向你致力于寻找他隐藏在MOD中的秘密致敬。在找到并到达这个地方时，你已经证明了你自己的努力是值得的。
Texts.Eng: The mod creator salutes your dedication to finding the secrets he has hidden in his creations. In finding and reaching this place, you've proven yourself worthy.

Texts.Chs: 路径在这里分叉。两者都会让你处于危险之中。面对邪恶的外星生命，我欣赏你的勇敢，祝你好运。
Texts.Eng: The path forks here. Both will place you in peril. I commend your bravery in the face of vicious alien life and wish you good luck.

Texts.Chs: 路径在这里分叉。我正在检测两侧的生命信号，请选择路径。
Texts.Eng: The path forks here. I'm detecting lifesigns on both ends, so take your pick.

Texts.Chs: 路径在这里分叉。山坡似乎是一条直通的路，但却充满了敌人。地雷更加危险，但你将面临更少的阻力。
Texts.Eng: The path forks here. The hillside is likely a straightforward path, but teeming with enemies. The mines are more treacherous, but you'll face less resistance.

Texts.Chs: 军阀的仆从似乎已经被俘虏了；如果你放了他们，他们可能会加入你。您应该需要所有可以得到的帮助。
Texts.Eng: The warlord's minions appear to have taken prisoners; they may join you if you free them. You will need all the help you can get.

Texts.Chs: 外星人和维修通风口似乎有些关联...
Texts.Eng: There appears to be something about aliens and maintenance vents...

Texts.Chs: 应该有一些方法来处理它们。原型装甲的缺点之一是它们无法在这中间快速机动。
Texts.Eng: There ought to be some way to dispose of them. One of the drawbacks of the prototype armour is that they can't run very fast in it.

Texts.Chs: 最后一场战斗中还剩下一些怪物 - 在你开始之前把它们清理干净，好吗？
Texts.Eng: There're also some monsters left over from the last battle - mop them up before you start, okay?

Texts.Chs: 这个地区有早期科学发展部设施的遗迹。他们应该已经被遗弃了...大部分
Texts.Eng: There're the remains of earlier Miniknog facilities in the area. They ought to be mostly abandoned... mostly.

Texts.Chs: 没有办法绕进去 - 控制门开闭的控制台也是连接到你面前的舱口的。对不起，要继续的话，你需要烧穿这玩意。
Texts.Eng: There's no way around it - the console holding the door shut is also connected to the hatch in front of you. I'm sorry, but to proceed you'll need to incinerate the dog.

Texts.Chs: 这些是弹跳垫。它们不像动能天体炮那样坚固，但它能让你跳得很高...如果受到作用力的话。
Texts.Eng: These here are bounce pads. They're hardly as strong as a kinetic orb cannon, but will keep you aloft...if bouncy.

Texts.Chs: 这些一定是我们被警告过的邪教徒。我相信他们在森林里有更多同伙。
Texts.Eng: These must be the cultists we were warned about. I'm sure there're more of them in the forest.

Texts.Chs: 这些传感器经过调整，只能检测到小伙伴Punchys，贪婪，信仰和仇恨。
Texts.Eng: These sensors are calibrated to detect only Companion Punchys, greed, faith, and hatred.

Texts.Chs: 他们不可能知道，不是吗？不，他们不可能知道。但是，在地球发生事故之前，莱西亚公司是怎么获得地球已破坏的生物量的数据呢？
Texts.Eng: They couldn't have known, could they? No, they couldn't. But how could Letheia have acquired Ruin biomass before Earth's...incident?

Texts.Chs: 他们明白了所有发生过的事情。
Texts.Eng: They desserved everything that hass happened.

Texts.Chs: 他们其实一直忙着腐蚀森林，不是吗？
Texts.Eng: They really have been busy corrupting the forest, haven't they?

Texts.Chs: 这些猿族似乎是因为营养不良死亡的。这些遗体显得极端憔悴。
Texts.Eng: This apex appears to have perished from malnutrition. The remains are positively emaciated.

Texts.Chs: 这扇门已锁上，无法打开。找个其他方法吧。
Texts.Eng: This door is locked and cannot be opened by any means. Find a way around.

Texts.Chs: 这只戴黑框眼镜的蛙看起来很孤单，我想他会喜欢你的公司。
Texts.Eng: This frog looks pretty lonely, I think he'd like your company.

Texts.Chs: 这扇门被锁上了。我想知道是否有办法在某个地方打开它...
Texts.Eng: This gate is locked. I wonder if there's a way to open it somewhere...

Texts.Chs: 这个舱口看起来有点意思；在附近应该有办法打开它。然后彻底搜索一下洞穴。
Texts.Eng: This hatch looks interesting; there ought to be a way to open it nearby. Search the cavern thoroughly.

Texts.Chs: 这个舱口似乎通向某些废墟。也许你应该去城里看看当地人是否已经操纵了其中的一些控件。
Texts.Eng: This hatch seems to lead into some ruins. Maybe you should check around town to see if the locals have rigged some controls up.

Texts.Chs: 这是个有趣的东西。你有可以制导的火箭发射器吗？否则我认为你没法够到开关。
Texts.Eng: This is an interesting one. Do you have a rocket launcher that can do guided rockets? I don't think you'll be able to reach the switch otherwise.

Texts.Chs: 这是手动覆写的按钮：请把它按下。我将推迟关机，直到你安全撤离。不会有定时的逃脱序列。
Texts.Eng: This is button for the manual override; please depress it. I will delay the shutdown until you safely evacuate. There will be no timed escape sequence.

Texts.Chs: 这一定是主要的制造工厂。嗯，我从之前几个恶棍那里得到的消息：这里可能有问题。
Texts.Eng: This must be the main fabrication plant. Hmm, I'm picking up signals from a couple of goons ahead; this could be problematic.

Texts.Chs: 这个容器看起来非常适合装载球状物体。
Texts.Eng: This receptacle appears perfectly suited for holding a ball-shaped object.

Texts.Chs: 这个服务器似乎标记了有重要数据。如果你发现其他服务器标有岩浆灯，我能够读取其中的数据。
Texts.Eng: This server appears to have important data marked out on it. If you find other servers marked out with lava lamps, I will be able to read their data.

Texts.Chs: 这地方有问题。它让我感到不适。
Texts.Eng: Thiss place iss WRONG. Jusst looking at it makess me feel ill.

Texts.Chs: 图南瓦克
Texts.Eng: Tonauac

Texts.Chs: 嗯，看看这些笑脸。我一点也不嫉妒你...
Texts.Eng: Ugh, look at all that slime. I don't envy you...

Texts.Chs: 额，不，亲爱的？
Texts.Eng: Uh, no, dear?

Texts.Chs: 有点意思。
Texts.Eng: Very funny.

Texts.Chs: 等等。你看到那片花地了吗？那个黄色的？尝试用物质操纵器挖掘它。
Texts.Eng: Wait. Do you see that patch of floral ground there? The yellow ones? Try digging it up with your matter manipulator.

Texts.Chs: 警告！前方的遏制激光极其致命！需要使用^orange;最大速度^reset;躲避！
Texts.Eng: Warning! Containment lasers ahead are EXTREMELY DEADLY! ^orange;MAXIMUM SPEED^reset; is required in order to evade them!

Texts.Chs: 警告！除非你装备了音速球，否则你不要试图逃离这个陷阱！
Texts.Eng: Warning! You should not attempt to evade this trap unless you have the sonic sphere equipped!

Texts.Chs: 请小心，这个地区的叶族人是出了名的凶残。甚至其他叶族人也害怕他们。
Texts.Eng: Watch out, the floran of thiss region are famouss for being very ssavage. Even other floranss fear them.

Texts.Chs: 相信通过研究Kluex的伟大创作，我们可以更多地了解神性本身及其工作方式！
Texts.Eng: We believe that by studying Kluex's great creations, we can learn more about the deity himself and the way he works!

Texts.Chs: 我们应该在某个时候一起研究它。
Texts.Eng: We should watch that together sometime.

Texts.Chs: 我们还不完全确定它们的目的是什么...所以我们将它们装配起来代替运输人员！
Texts.Eng: We're not exactly sure what they're intended for...so we rigged them up to transport people instead!

Texts.Chs: 我们在路上，路上，路上...
Texts.Eng: We're on a rail, on a rail, on a rail...

Texts.Chs: 我们到了！好吧，这看起来正像一潭农村的死水。
Texts.Eng: We've arrived! This looks like a proper rustic backwater, all right.

Texts.Chs: 欢迎，<insert subject name here>。您已选中或被选中，成为我们高科技测试系统的下一个受益者。
Texts.Eng: Welcome, <insert subject name here>. You have chosen, or been chosen, to be the next benefactor of our highly advanced testing systems.

Texts.Chs: 好，我们到了。这里肯定是研究团队生活和工作的地方，设计工具来残酷压迫人民，一眼就能知道他们在做什么...
Texts.Eng: Well, here we are. This must be where the research team lives and works, designing tools of cruel oppression, no doubt knowing what they're doing...

Texts.Chs: 嗯，这是非常棘手的情况。你没事儿吧？。
Texts.Eng: Well, that was quite the sticky situation. Are you all right?

Texts.Chs: 多么美的景色啊！顺便问一下，你记得带抓钩了吗？如果忘了，你还有时间回头拿一个。
Texts.Eng: What a beautiful sight! By the by, did you remember to bring a grappling hook? There's still time to turn back and get one if you forgot.

Texts.Chs: 这真是个宝物！我们发财了！我们发了！
Texts.Eng: What a treasure trove! We're rich! We're rich!

Texts.Chs: 真是个令人印象深刻的石版画。毫无疑问，这也是古代人用双手雕刻的...我好奇的是，这些话是什么意思？
Texts.Eng: What an impressive lithograph. No doubt this was carved by ancient hands, too... I wonder what those words mean?

Texts.Chs: 不过，你需要一个抓钩。如果你没有，请返回并收集一个。
Texts.Eng: What will be required, though, is a grappling hook. Please head back and collect one if you do not have this item.

Texts.Chs: 那是...什么？一个雕像？
Texts.Eng: What...is this? A statue?

Texts.Chs: 啥？
Texts.Eng: What?

Texts.Chs: 谁知道科学发展部用这种有毒的岩石生产了什么怪物？我觉得你不应该管它。
Texts.Eng: Who knows what kind of monsters the miniknog produced on this toxic rock? I think you should leave it well alone.

Texts.Chs: 喂喂喂，士兵。远离前门-你不能强闯这个设施。
Texts.Eng: Whoa whoa whoa WHOA, soldier. Get away from the front door - you're not going to be able to force your way into THIS facility.

Texts.Chs: 哇! 一艘观星者的飞船！我听说过他们，但从来没有见过！你被邀请上船了?我嫉妒死了！
Texts.Eng: Wow! A stargazer's ship! I'd heard of them, but never seen one! You're being invited on board? I'm so jealous!

Texts.Chs: 哇，你看看那个！正是那些危险信号。
Texts.Eng: Wow, will you look at that! Just what warrants all these danger signs?

Texts.Chs: 黄色探测器检测到你的伙伴Punchys。 蓝色探测器探测到...好吧，那是你。
Texts.Eng: Yellow detectors detect Companion Punchys. Blue detectors detect...well, you.

Texts.Chs: 是的！上面不是写着，'Kluex难道会带着这份忠诚上天吗'？勇敢冲出这边界，不要恐惧，我的朋友。
Texts.Eng: Yes! Is it not written. 'Kluex himself will carry the faithful to the skies'? Step out over the edge without fear, friend!

Texts.Chs: 是的...我想这应该是个大买卖...对你这样的叛徒而言。去大赚一把吧。政府算个鸟。
Texts.Eng: Yes...I think it's about time for a very palatable reward...for a traitor like you. Enjoy it while you can. GOV out.

Texts.Chs: 整个设施似乎被干扰信号屏蔽。如果再靠近点，我就不能再定位你，所以你只能自求多福了。
Texts.Eng: The entire facility appears to be surrounded by a jamming signal. I won't be able to get to you once you get any closer, so you'll be on your own.

Texts.Chs: 祝你好运，士兵。我觉得你需要它。Letheia的安全性毋庸置疑。
Texts.Eng: Good luck, soldier. I get the feeling you'll need it. Letheia doesn't mess around when it comes to its security.

Texts.Chs: 扫描表明这批舰队包括一艘战列舰，一艘航母，一艘油轮和许多其他小型船只。
Texts.Eng: Scans indicate the corporate fleet consists of a battleship, a carrier, a tanker, and numerous other small vessels.

Texts.Chs: 为了登上战列舰的核心部分，你需要先在航母和油轮的舰桥上激活IFF信号。
Texts.Eng: In order to board the battleship's main segment, you will need to activate IFF signals on the bridges of the carrier and tanker.

Texts.Chs: 考虑到舰队的规模，你的飞船初始能量储备可能不足，特别是当你遭到他们的防御系统反击之后。
Texts.Eng: Due to the size of the fleet, your mech's initial energy reserves may be insufficient, especially if you sustain damage from their defenses.

Texts.Chs: 登船，袭击他们的能源仓库可以大幅提高胜算。祝好运。
Texts.Eng: Boarding ships and raiding their energy stores may very well be crucial to your success. Good luck.

Texts.Chs: 你发现了史提尔技术Mk-5挂载式等离子体加特林。这种强大的武器对位于其射程内的东西具有很强的破坏性。
Texts.Eng: You have discovered a Steele Tech Mk-5 Mounted Plasma Gatling. This powerful weapon is incredibly devastating to anything caught in its line of fire.

Texts.Chs: 你发现了一个大宝贝。恭喜已就绪。
Texts.Eng: You have discovered an extremely well-hidden secret. Congratulations are in order.

Texts.Chs: 你掉陷阱了。处境危险。正试图确定您面临的危险程度...
Texts.Eng: You have fallen into a trap. You are in peril. Attempting to determine your current peril level...

Texts.Chs: 为什么古代遗址总是充满陷阱，令人费解。这难道是在这些人中流行的建筑风气？
Texts.Eng: You have to wonder why ancient ruins are always filled with traps. Was it a major architectural movement amongst these people?

Texts.Chs: 在出发之前，你可能想和当地人谈谈，并储备一些物资。一旦离开堡垒，我们将无法返回。
Texts.Eng: You might want to talk to the locals and stock up on supplies before heading out. We won't be able to return once we leave the fort.

Texts.Chs: 你不会去吃那些放在古老冰箱里的东西吧？谁知道放了多久，而且是在一个如此有毒的环境中。
Texts.Eng: You're not going to eat what you find in that ancient fridge, are you? Who knows how long that's been in there, and in so toxic an environment!

Texts.Chs: 你的伙计Punchy不是个样子货。它可以代替你流血，烧伤甚至死亡。
Texts.Eng: Your Companion Punchy is more durable than appearances might otherwise suggest. It will bleed, burn, and die for you so that you don't have to.

Texts.Chs: 你的伙计Punchy目前忠诚度指数为6。一旦降到0，你都不敢睡得太熟。
Texts.Eng: Your Companion Punchy's loyalty exponent is currently 6. Should it drop to zero, sleep with one eye open.
